page.title: 03RECREATION
page.content: Our area is{mainly residential.}There are many clubs and recreational facilities.The {Bitterne Leisure {Centre }provides a sports hall and a variety of activities for all ages, including the popular {Roller Disco} which attracts many young people. There is badminton,weight training, keep-fit and many ball sports. In a survey compiled by some pupils of our school it was discovered that out of 128 people of all ages,11.5% regularly attend an activity at the Leisure Centre,23.4% go to scouts,brownies,rangers or other groups of this kind.51% go to groups attached to churches.55% went to a sports club.16.6% attend a social club.More adults go to a social club and more children regularly attend a sports club.
